product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Simple
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-performance interchangeable lens system
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting settings
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Durable black metal body construction
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Advanced autofocus system for sharp captures
• Ideal for both beginners and enthusiast photographers
• Portable size perfect for travel photography
• Built-in hot shoe for external flash mounting
• Multiple customizable function buttons for quick access

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a centered, high-resolution product image ("product_image") of a camera against a modern, dark geometric background composed of layered circular and rectangular SVG elements. The background incorporates rounded shapes for depth and includes stylistic orange highlight circles, providing contrast and vibrance. At the top, bold, uppercase text ("heading") draws attention with a clean sans-serif font in white. Below it, a tagline ("tagline") in a smaller font size and orange color conveys a value proposition. The bottom section showcases the price ("price") in large white text, sitting on a dark base. The CTA ("cta" and "cta_background") is a vibrant orange button styled with bold text inviting action.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Dark Slate: #1E272E  
- Overlay Blue-Gray Circles: #2C3A47 (varying opacities)  
- Accent Orange: #F0932B  
- White Text: #FFFFFF  
- CTA Button Background: #F0932B  
- CTA Text: #1E272E
product_color: The product image showcases the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, which predominantly uses a sleek and professional black (#1C1C1C) as its main body color, symbolizing sophistication and quality. Silver metallic accents (#CCCCCC) on the dials and lens rings enhance contrast and draw attention to functional components. White inscriptions (#FFFFFF) on the brand and model name offer clear visibility and enhance branding, while subtle orange (#FFA500) and red (#FF0000) details on the lens scale add visual interest. The subtle use of glossy and matte finishes helps each color transition smoothly, highlighting shape without overwhelming the viewer. Ideal palette: #1C1C1C, #CCCCCC, #FFFFFF, #FFA500, #FF0000.
